source.dde5e564:
features = [x for x in h2o_train.columns if x not in ['Index', 'Defaulted?']]

h2o_aml = H2OAutoML(
    max_runtime_secs=60,
    stopping_metric='AUCPR' #AUCPR (Area Under the Precision-Recall Curve) 
)

h2o_aml.train(x=features, y='Defaulted?', training_frame=h2o_train)
